cookie.name: Cinnamon Sugar
cookie.headline: The Cookie Reinvented. Again
cookie.description: To say that this cookie will change your life is to so vastly understate it's importance that we simply must call it most significant achievemnt in human history.  Yes, it's just sugar, butter and flower but never before have those three ingredients come together in a way that manifests utter perfection

value.Cookie Plus: free, and you get a jello shot
like a cinnamon sugar cookie, but more groundbreaking

value.Cookie: has zero negative impact on your health
value.Cookie Plus: makes you skinnier and more attractive

cookieDark.name: Chocolate
cookieDark.headline:
Like a chocolate cookie. 
Unlike any chocolate cookie
cookieDark.description: The most loved cookie is about to make you fall in love all over again. Available in regular and plus sizes, our new cookies represent the next evolution in baking technology.  Sleek and sugary with a taste as revolutionary as it is delicious, our cookies will literally change your life.  No, we mean literally change. your. life.

value.Cookie Dark Plus: free, and you get a jello shot
like a chocolate cookie, but better

value.Cookie: equivalent to your daily requirement of fruits and vegetables

vodka.name: Apple Nice
vodka.headline: Stay active. Stay healthy.
vodka.description: Monitor your health. Track your workouts. Get the motivation you need to achieve... actually, this drink achieves the opposite of those things just mentioned.  While the Apple Nice probably won't make you healthier you'll definitely have more fun than if you were sober.  Just tell yourself you'll work out extra hard tomorrow.

value.Apple Nice Plus: free, but in a bigger cup
great, but in a bigger cup

fireball.name: Apple Spice
fireball.headline: Beaty outside. Beast inside.
fireball.description: The Apple Spice represents the culmination of alcohol and cider technology, perfected through thousands of hours of meticulous trial and error(many hangovers).  We've achieved the optimum ratio of vodka, apple cider and lemon juice and fused them into a tasty drink that will revolutionize alcoholic beverages, again.

value.Apple Spice Plus: free, but in a bigger cup
great, but in a bigger cup
